title: Easy beansy layered nachos
ingredients: ['2 (175g) bags of tortilla chips', 'drizzle of olive oil (for frying)', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '1 clove of crushed garlic', '3 medium sized tomatoes, diced', '1 (400g) tin refried beans', '300g block Cheddar cheese, grated', 'drizzle of water (for thinning mixture)', '1 to 2 jalapeno or green chillies, sliced', 'salt and pepper to taste']
